name: shadow-widget
description: Yet another 'react + reflux + react-router', more simple and powerful, suports visual progamming.

scripts.start: browserify src/index_dev.js -o bundle.js -t [ babelify --compact false --presets [ env react ] ]
scripts.start_cdn: browserify -u react -u react-dom src/index_cdn.js -o src/bundle_cdn.js -t [ babelify --compact false --presets [ env react ] ]

author: wayne chan
